bike.description: FSR technology, FACT 10m carbon, Az-1 front triangle with M5 rear triangle, magnesium shock link, full cartridge bearings, disc compatible, 130mm travel, replaceable derailleur hanger, two sets of water bottle bosses

components.description: Fox remote Brain Fade, adjustable trail tune setting, adjustable rebound
1 1/8" threadless, integrated alloy cups, cartridge bearing
Thomson, 7000 series aluminum, 2-bolt adjustable, set back head, 30.9mm x 367/410mm
7050 hard annodized alloy collar with QR, 34.9mm clamp ID, black
Chain stay/seat stay protector, derailleur protector, reflectors, owners manual
